summary: I will never be the same again.
title: I will never be the same again.
body:
When choosing which Pokemon to use for the film, Baxter was surprised to learn some disturbing facts. For example, his team designed a lifelike version of Sawk, a humanoid fighting Pokemon that looks like it’s wearing a gi, complete with a black belt tied around its waist.

Only, Baxter told us that when they showed it to TPC, they got some unexpected news.

“We found out that the outfit is actually it’s skin,” he recalled with a laugh.

And that goes for other outfit-wearing Pokemon like Machamp and Mr. Mime. Those are flesh clothes. Enjoy that knowledge!

(X)

Only, Baxter told us that when they showed it to TPC, they got some unexpected news.

“We found out that the outfit is actually it’s skin,” he recalled with a laugh.

And that goes for other outfit-wearing Pokemon like Machamp and Mr. Mime. Those are flesh clothes. Enjoy that knowledge!

(X)

When choosing which Pokemon to use for the film, Baxter was surprised to learn some disturbing facts. For example, his team designed a lifelike version of Sawk, a humanoid fighting Pokemon that looks like it’s wearing a gi, complete with a black belt tied around its waist.

Only, Baxter told us that when they showed it to TPC, they got some unexpected news.

“We found out that the outfit is actually it’s skin,” he recalled with a laugh.

And that goes for other outfit-wearing Pokemon like Machamp and Mr. Mime. Those are flesh clothes. Enjoy that knowledge!

(X)
trail.content:
When choosing which Pokemon to use for the film, Baxter was surprised to learn some disturbing facts. For example, his team designed a lifelike version of Sawk, a humanoid fighting Pokemon that looks like it’s wearing a gi, complete with a black belt tied around its waist.

Only, Baxter told us that when they showed it to TPC, they got some unexpected news.

“We found out that the outfit is actually it’s skin,” he recalled with a laugh.

And that goes for other outfit-wearing Pokemon like Machamp and Mr. Mime. Those are flesh clothes. Enjoy that knowledge!

(X)

summary: Pokemon Cinematic Universe a Possibility After Detective Pikachu - IGN
title: Pokemon Cinematic Universe a Possibility After Detective Pikachu - IGN
excerpt: A Detective Pikachu producer gives hope for a live-action Pokemon Cinematic Universe. Here's what she said.
description:
Well, we have official confirmation that Legendary Entertainment are considering a full blown live-action Pokémon franchise, assuming Detective Pikachu does well (Which I think that’s a given at this point). It’s a vague answer yes, but considering a Detective Pikachu sequel was already announced almost 2 months ago now, this is a positive sign.

Pokémon Colosseum movie when? :D

(Side note, I have to laugh at he bit about there only being 19 movies and 6 seasons of the Pokémon anime. Like… wow, failed a google search there, didn’t ya XD)

summary: Detective Pikachu Movie to Get Comic Adaptation
title: Detective Pikachu Movie to Get Comic Adaptation
body:
Detective Pikachu Movie to Get Comic Adaptation

Comic fans rejoice. The Detective Pikachu Hollywood movie is getting a comic adaptation.

Legendary Comics will publish the graphic novel following the adventures of Tim Goodman and the eponymous Detective Pikachu as they journey through Ryme City searching for Tim’s missing father. The graphic novel will be available in the summer of 2019.

Based on the 2016 game developed by Creatures Inc. and…

View On WordPress

summary: I’ve been feeling kinda dumb about being so excited for Detective Pikachu, but the other day I realized this will be the first...
body: I’ve been feeling kinda dumb about being so excited for Detective Pikachu, but the other day I realized this will be the first time in my life that I’ll get to see Pokemon in theaters. So that’s pretty cool.

summary: Legendary Comics Announces Pokémon Detective Pikachu Graphic Novel Pokémon Detective Pikachu the graphic novel is written by...
caption:
Legendary Comics Announces Pokémon Detective Pikachu Graphic Novel

Pokémon Detective Pikachu the graphic novel is written by Brian Buccellato with art by Nelson Dániel. The graphic novel goes on sale in Summer 2019.

(Image via Legendary Comics)

summary:
Detective Pikachu: Whoa, you can understand me?
Yellow: Yes, I can understand all Pokemon.
Detective Pikachu: (face scrunched up...
body:
Detective Pikachu: Whoa, you can understand me?
Yellow: Yes, I can understand all Pokemon.
Detective Pikachu: (face scrunched up and ready to cry) I've been so lonely!
Yellow: (patting him on the back) There, there...

summary: Just simply looking at the live-action pokemon in the Detective Pikachu trailers fills me with a kind of indescribable joy and...
body:
Just simply looking at the live-action pokemon in the Detective Pikachu trailers fills me with a kind of indescribable joy and excitement. Like, I’ve been invested and excited for new entries in franchises I love a lot of times in the past decade, but I honestly can’t remember the last time I felt this level of sheer anticipation for anything, even Dragon Ball Super.

I just… God, I love Pokémon so much.
